 Work closely with IT and system owners to implement data integration solutions (APIs, scheduled exports, etc.). Monitor data flows to ensure timely and accurate updates. * ****Analytics \\& Reporting Enablement:****

Create documentation and maintain definitions for the data (e.g. data dictionary) to ensure consistency. * ****Automation of HR Processes:****
 Identify opportunities to streamline, enable self\\-service, and automate manual processes in the People Ops realm. * ****Collaboration \\& Consulting:****

Collaborate with the People Analytics Team to understand business questions and ensure the data is structured to answer them. Provide technical expertise in conversations about new HR tech vendors – for example, assessing how our applicant tracking platform could integrate with our warehouse, or how to export data for analysis. Build reusable frameworks and pipelines that can be leveraged by others on the team, thereby accelerating future development.
